overview: Paul loses Sylvie, the woman of his life, who leaves slamming the door. Paul is unlucky when it comes to love...ruined and distressed he thinks about committing suicide, until an antique dealer hands him a talisman that has the power to make women crazy with lust! This erotic/fantastic tale magnificently shows Laure Sainclair in her first ever-hardcore appearance.
title: Skin on Fire
